findings: Fall protection in place on all elevated work areas. Two workers missing high-visibility vests on ground level. Housekeeping excellent.
corrective_actions: Issued replacement vests and reminded crew of PPE requirements. Posted updated PPE signage at site entrance.

findings: Fire extinguishers inspected and current on floors 1-4. Floor 5 extinguisher past monthly inspection date. Hot work permit for welding was properly posted.
corrective_actions: Replaced floor 5 extinguisher with newly inspected unit. Updated inspection log.

findings: All equipment pre-operation inspection logs current. Excavator daily checklist complete. Crane annual certification valid through August 2026. One frayed sling identified and removed.
corrective_actions: Tagged and removed damaged sling from service. Ordered replacement. Conducted crew briefing on rigging inspection.

findings: Guardrails on second floor deck complete and secure. Open stairwell penetration missing cover. Electrical cords properly routed on ground level. Trench box in place for utility work.
corrective_actions: Installed plywood cover over stairwell opening and marked with warning tape. Added to daily inspection checklist.

findings: Generator grounding verified. Compressor pressure relief valve tested and functional. Scissor lift operator certifications current. One ladder missing safety feet.
corrective_actions: Removed defective ladder from site. Replaced with inspected unit from equipment yard.

findings: Excellent housekeeping across all work areas. PPE compliance 100%. Fall protection systems properly installed. Emergency evacuation routes clearly posted. First aid kits fully stocked.
corrective_actions: No corrective actions required. Commended site superintendent and crew leads for safety culture.
